description._content: Image taken from: Title: "History of Runcorn; with an account of the ancient village of Weston ... Drawings by H. Fitton. Page: 156 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1887 Publisher: Mackie & Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002650857 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
